name: part_004
file: tmp_【#紫咲シオン卒業LIVE】最大の感謝を込めて。【MurasakiShion Graduation LIVE】 [4RYbmR8oJHw]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Murasaki Shion performs the song 'Darekago Shinzou ni Naretanara' (If I Could Become Someone's Heart) on a futuristic gothic stage.
The song ends, and a school bell rings, followed by an announcement for Shion to report to the principal's office.
Shion arrives at the principal's office where a 3D avatar of YAGOO (Motoaki Tanigo) presents her with a graduation certificate.
A real-life video message from Motoaki Tanigo (YAGOO) plays, answering questions previously asked by Shion.

subtitles.original: もう死ぬほどさ、笑ってみせてよ
subtitles.english: Give me a smile, like you're dying to.

subtitles.original: もしも夢が覚めなければ、姿を変えずにいられた？
subtitles.english: If the dream hadn't ended, could I have stayed the same?

subtitles.original: 解けた指から消える温度、血を巡らせるのは誰の思い出？
subtitles.english: The warmth fading from unclasped fingers, whose memories are circulating through the blood?

subtitles.original: 雨に濡れた肺、啜り泣く秒針、並んだ送電塔、
subtitles.english: Lungs soaked by rain, sobbing second hands, lined-up transmission towers,

subtitles.original: 夕暮れ飛ばす停まったままの観覧車
subtitles.english: A stopped ferris wheel against the evening sky.

subtitles.original: 机に咲く花、君の声も、何もかも、最初から無かったみたい
subtitles.english: The flower blooming on the desk, your voice, everything, it's as if it never existed from the start.

subtitles.original: 死にたい僕は今日も息をして、
subtitles.english: I, wanting to die, breathe again today,

subtitles.original: 生きたい君は明日を見失って
subtitles.english: While you, wanting to live, lose sight of tomorrow.

subtitles.original: なのになんで悲しいのだろう、リフレインするのが人間だ
subtitles.english: Even so, why is it so sad? Humans are creatures of refrain.

subtitles.original: 永遠なんてないけど、思い通りの日々じゃないけど
subtitles.english: There's no such thing as eternity, and days don't always go as planned.

subtitles.original: 脆く弱い糸に繋がれた、次の夜明けがまた訪れる
subtitles.english: Connected by a fragile, weak thread, the next dawn will arrive once more.

subtitles.original: どんな世界も君がいるなら、生きていたいって思えたんだよ
subtitles.english: In any world, if you're there, I felt like I wanted to keep living.

subtitles.original: 僕の地獄で君はいつでも、絶えず鼓動する心臓だ
subtitles.english: In my hell, you are always the heart that never stops beating.

subtitles.original: いつしか君がくれたように
subtitles.english: Just like you once gave to me,

subtitles.original: 僕も誰かの心臓になれたなら
subtitles.english: If I could also become someone's heart.

subtitles.original: はい！というわけで
subtitles.english: Yes! And so...

subtitles.original: あ？
subtitles.english: Huh?

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: なんだこれ？
subtitles.english: What's this?

subtitles.original: ホロライブ2期生 紫咲シオンさん、
subtitles.english: Hololive 2nd Gen Murasaki Shion-san,

subtitles.original: 至急校長室まで来てください
subtitles.english: please come to the principal's office immediately.

subtitles.original: えー、めんどくさーい。なんでー？
subtitles.english: Ehh, what a pain. Why?

subtitles.original: 仕方ないですね
subtitles.english: I guess I have no choice.

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: なに？
subtitles.english: What?

subtitles.original: わー！
subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original: すごい！
subtitles.english: Amazing!

subtitles.original: なにこれ、めっちゃ綺麗！
subtitles.english: What is this? It's so beautiful!

subtitles.original: すご！
subtitles.english: Wow!

subtitles.original: シオンさん、こちらへどうぞ
subtitles.english: Shion-san, please come this way.

subtitles.original: YAGOOさんだ。はい
subtitles.english: It's YAGOO-san. Yes.

subtitles.original: 卒業証書。紫咲シオン、12月8日生まれ
subtitles.english: Graduation Certificate. Murasaki Shion, born on December 8th.

subtitles.original: あなたは魔界学校の課程を修了しましたので、
subtitles.english: You have completed the curriculum of the Demon World School,

subtitles.original: ここに証します。令和7年4月26日、谷郷元昭
subtitles.english: and I hereby certify it. April 26, Reiwa 7 (2025). Motoaki Tanigo.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: みんな見て！
subtitles.english: Everyone, look!

subtitles.original: もらっちゃった、卒業証書！イエーイ！
subtitles.english: I got it, my graduation certificate! Yay!

subtitles.original: すごい！うわ、すごいこれ
subtitles.english: Amazing! Wow, this is incredible.

subtitles.original: お？
subtitles.english: Oh?

subtitles.original: え？
subtitles.english: Eh?

subtitles.original: 何、何？
subtitles.english: What, what?

subtitles.original: ほうほう、ほうほう
subtitles.english: I see, I see.

subtitles.original: え、まだ私に渡したいものがあるの？
subtitles.english: Eh, you still have something you want to give me?

subtitles.original: えー！
subtitles.english: Wha-!

subtitles.original: シオンさん、お疲れ様です
subtitles.english: Shion-san, thank you for your hard work.

subtitles.original: 配信をご視聴のファンの皆様、いつも応援ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: To all the fans watching the stream, thank you always for your support.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: カバー株式会社の谷郷元昭です
subtitles.english: I'm Motoaki Tanigo from Cover Corp.

subtitles.original: お、本物だ！
subtitles.english: Oh, the real one!

subtitles.original: 実は今回、シオンさんから質問を預かってきています
subtitles.english: Actually, I've received some questions from Shion-san.

subtitles.original: 実は今回シオンさんから質問を預かってきています
subtitles.english: Actually, I've received some questions from Shion-san.

subtitles.original: そういえば、質問したな。
subtitles.english: Oh right, I did ask some questions.

subtitles.original: そういえば、なんか
subtitles.english: Come to think of it.

subtitles.original: 免許はＭＴですか？ＡＴですか？
subtitles.english: Is your license for Manual or Automatic?

subtitles.original: 免許はマニュアルですね。
subtitles.english: My license is for a manual transmission.

subtitles.original: あ、いいよー！
subtitles.english: Oh, nice!

subtitles.original: 良かったー
subtitles.english: Good.

subtitles.original: 他の免許はもっていますか？
subtitles.english: Do you have any other licenses?

subtitles.original: え、なんかあるのかな？
subtitles.english: Eh, I wonder if there's anything else?

subtitles.original: 他は免許は持ってないです。
subtitles.english: I don't have any other licenses.

subtitles.original: あ、車なんだね
subtitles.english: Ah, so just for cars.

subtitles.original: 当時なぜ私に声をかけたのか気になります！理由はありますか？
subtitles.english: I'm curious why you reached out to me back then! Is there a reason?

subtitles.original: え、これ気になる！どうしよう。
subtitles.english: Eh, I'm curious about this! What if...

subtitles.original: なんもなかったら
subtitles.english: ...it's nothing?

subtitles.original: 配信者として魅力を感じたからですね。
subtitles.english: Because I felt your charm as a streamer.

subtitles.original: まぁ、ちょっと、やんちゃな感じのところとかが
subtitles.english: Well, your somewhat mischievous side and so on.
